name: Sneaker (itch) (FunFireRabbit)
description:
# Sneaker

A 2D, top down, stealth game. You play as "Milo" - a sneaker operative, on a secret mission to steal important documents from Acme Inc, without being seen by the security guards.

### Player Controls

  • Move Up: W / UP Arrow 
  • Move Down: S / Down Arrow
  • Move Left: A / Left Arrow
  • Move Right: D / Right Arrow
  • Action: Spacebar / Carriage Return

## Theme

Secret Mission

### Background

Created  for Trijam #205 

### Platform

Made with the Godot engine:

- HTML 5
